body:
Hey guys, back again with another community spotlight! I'll be doing these every week on Mondays. This week's community member, is Zegita!

What is your username in Minecraft and what is your favourite game on Avicus?
Zegita and CTW

Introduce yourself in 3-4 sentences.
Hey guys I'm Zegita or most people just call me Zeg because there are so many different ways in saying my name lol and I'm 16 years old entering into sixth form/college (16-18 year olds). I have played Avicus since it was McZone and I roughly joined around mid 2013. I have played every tournament since ToC and I have come top 3 each one (2nd, 2nd, 3rd). I live in the UK and was born in Manchester but I moved to London when I was 1 and a half years old and have lived here for basically all my life (15 years). 

​What are you the most excited/obsessed over at the moment?
I'm a big fan of martial arts and excited for sixth form (college) soon 

What interests you the most in life?​
 I'm interested in studying astronomy and space in general. I love travelling as well and going to different countries and learning new things about life.

​What music/art/media do you like?
I like funky music a lot with an upbeat rhythm to it and just in general any music that is good lol 

​Where are you from?
England, UK

​What do you spend most of your time doing while on Avicus?​
I normally just play with my teammates and we just go for kill farms. I mainly play scrims and tournaments on Avicus.

​Anything else you want to mention?
Kylo never ever update to 1.9 or else you will kill the server. Don't do an OCN. I got a yt channel show me some love ;) If anyone can buy me a rank on Avicus that would be sweet because I'm too broke to get a rank :( . Thanks I love you all <3

title: Community Spotlight #2 - Zegita

replies.body: First one this time! It is great to know about you Zegita :D Hope to see you in game

replies.body: IMO: You should try to interview some ''unknown'' players here, maybe not some new guy who joined yesterday, but has been here long enough to have played Avicus on different versions and maybe taking part in a tourney. :)
